rules

Class NetClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • rules.NetClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectInfoPanel.Printable, java.io.Serializable

    public class NetClass
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ObjectInfoPanel.Printable
    Describes routing rules for individual nets.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DefaultItemClearanceClasses default_item_clearance_classes
      The clearance classes of the item types, if this net class comes from a class in a Speccctra dsn-file Should evtl be moved to designformats.specctra.NetClass and used only when reading a dsn-file.

      • get_minimum_trace_length

        public double get_minimum_trace_length()
        Returns the minimum trace length of this net class. If the result is <= 0, there is no minimal trace length restriction.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • set_minimum_trace_length

        public void set_minimum_trace_length(double p_value)
        Sets the minimum trace length of this net class to p_value. If p_value is <= 0, there is no minimal trace length restriction.
        Parameters:
        p_value - a double.
